info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: The unifying philosophy that runs through the four sets of colors in BOYSEN®® Color Trend 2016 is Mother Earth and humankind's relationship with her. The palettes are guidelines which you can use to select contemporary colors and their possible combinations for your living spaces. Listen to what your creative genius is saying and let go, play, experiment, and discover. RECHARGE, RENEW, RECREATE, and REALM
